text: Studley Oldham Burroughs was an illustrator and cartoonist. Burroughs drew the comic strip Self Control is a Wonderful Virtue for the Los Angeles Tribune's Sunday Fiction Magazine in 1916.http://www.lineacurve.com/en/illustration/studley-oldham-burroughs In 1931, he began composing covers for his uncle Edgar Rice Burroughs' new publishing company ERB Inc., including Tarzan the Invincible, Jungle Girl, and Apache Devil.http://www.erbzine.com/mag0/0053.html ==References== Category:1892 births Category:1949 deaths
